prathame merusāvarṇe pravakṣyāmi munīñ śṛṇu  HVAppI 
meghātithis tu paulastyo vasuḥ kāśyapa eva ca  HVAppI 
jyotiṣmān bhārgavaś caiva dyutimān aṅgirās tathā  HVAppI 
savanaś caiva vāsiṣṭha ātreyo havyavāhanaḥ  HVAppI 
paulahaḥ sapta ity ete ṛṣayo rohite 'ntare  HVAppI 
devatānāṃ gaṇās tatra traya eva narādhipa  HVAppI 
dakṣaputrasya putrās te rohitasya prajāpateḥ  HVAppI 
dhṛṣṭaketur dīptaketuḥ pañcahotro nirākṛtiḥ  HVAppI 
pṛthuśravā bhūridyumna ṛcīko bṛhato gayaḥ  HVAppI

daśame tv atha paryāye dvitīyasyāntare manoḥ  HVAppI 
haviṣmān paulahaś caiva sukṛtiś caiva bhārgavaḥ  HVAppI 
āpomūrtis tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhaś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ  HVAppI 
paulastyaḥ pramatiś caiva nābhogaś caiva kāśyapaḥ  HVAppI 
aṅgirā nabhasaḥ satyaḥ saptaite paramarṣayaḥ  HVAppI 
devatānāṃ gaṇau dvau tau ṛṣimantrāś ca ye smṛtāḥ  HVAppI 
manoḥ sutottamaujāś ca nikuṣañjaś ca vīryavān  HVAppI 
śatānīko nirāmitro vṛṣaseno jayadrathaḥ  HVAppI 
bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāś ca daśa tv ete manoḥ sutāḥ  HVAppI 
ekādaśe 'tha paryāye tṛtīyasyāntare manoḥ  HVAppI 
tasya saptaṛṣīṃś cāpi kīrtyamānān nibodha me  HVAppI 
haviṣmān kāśyapaś cāpi haviṣmān yaś ca bhārgavaḥ  HVAppI 
taruṇaś ca tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhas tv anaghas tathā  HVAppI 
aṅgirāś cārudhiṣṇyaś ca paulastyo niścaras tathā  HVAppI 
paulahaś cāgnitejāś ca bhāvyāḥ sapta maharṣayaḥ  HVAppI 
brahmaṇas tu sutā devā gaṇās teṣāṃ trayaḥ smṛtāḥ  HVAppI 
sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ purūdvahaḥ  HVAppI 
kṣemadhanvā dṛḍhāyuś ca ādarśaḥ paṇḍako manuḥ  HVAppI 
sāvarṇasya tu putrā vai tṛtīyasya nava smṛtāḥ  HVAppI 
caturthasya tu sāvarṇer ṛṣīn sapta nibodha me  HVAppI 
dyutir vasiṣṭhaputraś ca ātreyaḥ sutapās tathā  HVAppI 
aṅgirās tapasomūrtis tapasvī kāśyapas tathā  HVAppI 
tapośanaś ca paulastyaḥ paulahaś ca tapo raviḥ  HVAppI 
bhārgavaḥ saptamas teṣāṃ vijñeyas tu tapodhṛtiḥ  HVAppI 
pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā mānasā brahmaṇaś ca te  HVAppI 
devavāyur adūraś ca devaśreṣṭho vidūrathaḥ  HVAppI 
mitravān mitravindaś ca mitrasenaś ca mitrakṛt  HVAppI 
mitrabāhuḥ suvarcāś ca dvādaśasya manoḥ sutāḥ  HVAppI 
trayodaśe 'tha paryāye bhāvye manvantare manoḥ  HVAppI 
aṅgirāś caiva dhṛtimān paulastyo havyapastu yaḥ  HVAppI 
paulahas tattvadarśī ca bhārgavaś ca nirutsukaḥ  HVAppI 
niṣprakampas tathātreyo nirmohaḥ kaśyapas tathā  HVAppI 
sutapāś caiva vāsiṣṭhaḥ saptaite tu maharṣayaḥ  HVAppI 
traya eva gaṇāḥ proktā devatānāṃ svayaṃbhuvā  HVAppI 
trayodaśasya putrās te vijñeyās tu ruceḥ sutāḥ  HVAppI 
citraseno vicitraś ca nayo dharmabhṛto dhṛtaḥ  HVAppI 
sunetraḥ kṣatravṛddhaś ca sutapā nirbhayo dṛḍhaḥ  HVAppI 
raucyasyaite manoḥ putrā antare tu trayodaśe  HVAppI 
caturdaśe 'tha paryāye bhautyasya evāntare manoḥ  HVAppI 
agnīdhraḥ kāśyapaś caiva paulasyo māgadhas tathā  HVAppI 
bhārgavo hy atibāhuś ca śucir āṅgirasas tathā  HVAppI 
yuktaś caiva tathātreyaḥ śukro vāsiṣṭha eva ca  HVAppI 
ajitaḥ paulahaś caiva antyāḥ saptarṣayaś ca te  HVAppI

ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kriyākalpaṃ yathāvidhi  HVAppI 
kāmyanaimittikājasra śrāddhakarmaṇi nityaśaḥ  HVAppI

kimarthaṃ brahmadattasya pūjanīyā śakuntikā  HVAppI 
andhaṃ cakāra gāṅgeya jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ purā vibho  HVAppI

etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ prabravīhi yathātatham  HVAppI 
bhīṣma uvāca
śṛṇu sarvaṃ mahārāja yathā vṛttam abhūt purā  HVAppI 
brahmadattasya bhavane tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira  HVAppI 
kācic chakuntikā rājan brahmadattasya vai sakhī  HVAppI

āryā kātyāyanī devī kauśikī brahmacāriṇī  HVAppI 
jananī siddhasenasya durgā vīrā mahātapāḥ  HVAppI 
jayā ca vijayā caiva puṣṭiś ca tvaṃ kṣamā dayā  HVAppI

bahurūpā virūpā ca anekavidharūpiṇī  HVAppI 
virūpākṣī viśālākṣī bhaktānāṃ parirakṣaṇī  HVAppI 
parvatāgreṣu ghoreṣu nadīṣu ca guhāsu ca  HVAppI 
vāsas tava mahādevi vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca  HVAppI

ghaṇṭāninādabahulā viśrutā vindhyavāsinī  HVAppI 
triśūlapaṭṭisadharā sūryacandrapatākinī  HVAppI 
navamī kṛṣṇapakṣasya śuklasyaikādaśī priyā  HVAppI 
bhaginī vāsudevasya rajanī kalahapriyā  HVAppI 
āvāsaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ niṣṭhā ca paramā gatiḥ  HVAppI 
nandagopasutā caiva devānāṃ vijayāvahā  HVAppI 
cīravāsāḥ suvāsāś ca raudrī saṃdhyā tvam eva ca  HVAppI 
prakīrṇakeśī mṛtyuś ca tathā māṃsaudanapriyā  HVAppI 
lakṣmīr alakṣmīrūpeṇa dānavānāṃ vadhāya ca  HVAppI 
sāvitrī cāpi devānāṃ mātā bhūtagaṇasya ca  HVAppI 
antarvedī ca yajñānām ṛtvijāṃ caiva dakṣiṇā  HVAppI 
siddhiḥ sāṃyātrikāṇāṃ ca velā sāgarayāyinām  HVAppI 
yakṣāṇāṃ prathamā yakṣī nāgānāṃ suraseti ca  HVAppI

śakunī pūtanā ca tvaṃ revatī ca sudāruṇā  HVAppI 
nidrā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ mohanī kṣatriyā tathā  HVAppI

āsannamuktayaḥ kecit kecid dhyānaikatatparāḥ  HVAppI 
dhyānena manasā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭavantas tapodhanāḥ  HVAppI

asito devalas tāta vālmīkiś ca mahātapāḥ  HVAppI

ādāyārghyaṃ yathāyogam uṭajāt svāt samāyayuḥ  HVAppI 
te ca gatvā hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇum īśaṃ janārdanam  HVAppI 
bhaktinamrās tadā devaṃ praṇemur bhaktavatsalam  HVAppI 
namo 'stu kṛṣṇa krṣneti devadeveti keśavam  HVAppI 
praṇavātmañ jagannātha natāḥ sma śirasā hare  HVAppI 
viṣṇo jiṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa keśaveti ca sarvadā  HVAppI 
praṇām apraṇatā viprāḥ prāhur itthaṃ jagatpatim  HVAppI 
idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ viṣṭaram eva ca  HVAppI 
kṛtārthāḥ sarvathā deva prasanno no jagatpatiḥ  HVAppI 
kiṃ kurmaḥ kiṃ nu naḥ kṛtyaṃ kaścid doṣaḥ prabho hare  HVAppI 
iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve sthitā devasya pārśvataḥ  HVAppI 
kṛṣno 'pi tad yathāyogam upayujya sahāmaraiḥ  HVAppI 
kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ munivarā vardhatāṃ tapa uttamam  HVAppI 
iti bruvan purāṇātmā prītas tena garutmatā  HVAppI 
āsanaṃ lambhayām āsa rātrau devo janārdanaḥ  HVAppI 
kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān bhūyo munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām  HVAppI 
agnihotreṣu tapasi tathā kṛtyeṣu sarvaśaḥ  HVAppI 
evamādi jagannāthaḥ pṛṣṭavān īśvaras tadā  HVAppI 
sarvatra kuśalaṃ te tu brūyuḥ kṛṣṇasya tattvataḥ  HVAppI 
ātithyaṃ cakrire te tu nīvāraiḥ phalamūlakaiḥ  HVAppI 
devānām atha sarveṣāṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇasya yatnataḥ  HVAppI 
ātithyam upayuñjānas tataḥ prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ  HVAppI

śaineyo vṛṣṇivīras tu gadām utsṛjya satvaram  HVAppI 
talenābhyahanad vīro vāsudevaṃ raṇājire  HVAppI 
talena vāsudevo 'pi sātyakiṃ satyasaṃgaram  HVAppI 
tayor evaṃ mahāghoraṃ talayuddham avartata  HVAppI 
jānubhyāṃ muṣṭibhiś caiva bāhubhyāṃ śirasā tathā  HVAppI 
urasoraḥ samāhatya jānubhyāṃ śirasā tathā  HVAppI 
karābhyāṃ karam āhatya tau yuddhaṃ saṃpracakratuḥ  HVAppI 
tālayos tatra rājendra vṛkṣayoḥ saṃnikṛṣṭayoḥ  HVAppI 
vane yathāgnir utpannas tathaivāsīt sudāruṇaḥ  HVAppI 
tāv ājau prathitau vīrāv ubhau pauṇḍrakasātyakī  HVAppI 
niśi stimitamūkāyāṃ śastraṃ tyaktvā mahābalau  HVAppI 
yuyudhāte mahāraṅge mallau dvāv iva viśrutau  HVAppI 
ubhe sene mahārāja saṃśayaṃ jagmatus tadā  HVAppI 
kiṃ nu syāt sātyakir vīro hato 'nena durātmanā  HVAppI 
āhosvid vāsudevas tu hato 'nena bhaviṣyati  HVAppI 
atha vaitau mahāvīrau parasparavadhaiṣiṇau  HVAppI 
hatvā parasparaṃ vīrau vīrasvargaṃ gamiṣyataḥ  HVAppI 
anyathā noparamyetāṃ yuddhād vīrau suviśrutau  HVAppI 
aho vīryam aho dhairyam etayor balaśālinoḥ  HVAppI 
etau mahābhaṭau loke naitau prākṛtasaṃmatau  HVAppI 
naivaṃ yuddhaṃ mahāghoram āsīd devāsureṣv api  HVAppI 
na śruto na ca vā dṛṣṭaḥ saṃgrāmo 'yaṃ kadācana  HVAppI 
evaṃ te sainikā brūyuḥ senayor ubhayor api  HVAppI 
rātrau niśātame ghore dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam  HVAppI 
atha tau bāhubhir ghoraiḥ saṃnipetatur ojasā  HVAppI 
daśabhir muṣṭibhir jaghne sātyakiḥ pauṇḍranandanam  HVAppI 
pañcabhiḥ sātyakiṃ pauṇḍraḥ samājaghne mahābalaḥ  HVAppI 
tayoś caṭacaṭāśabdo brahmāṇḍakṣobhaṇo mahān  HVAppI 
prādur āsīt tu sarvatra sarvān vismāpayann iva  HVAppI

etasminn antare kruddha ekalavyo niṣādapaḥ  HVAppI 
balabhadram abhiprekṣya dhanur ādāya satvaram  HVAppI

ciccheda dhanur ardhaṃ tat sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ  HVAppI

prāhiṇod baladevāya niśitaṃ ghoravigraham  HVAppI

tilaśaḥ pañcabhir bāṇaiś cakāra yadunandanaḥ  HVAppI 
tato 'paraṃ mahākhaḍgaṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ śubham  HVAppI

taṃ cāpi daśabhir vīro mādhavo yadupuṃgavaḥ  HVAppI 
bāṇair nimeṣamātreṇa nirbibheda mahāraṇe  HVAppI 
tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya ghaṇṭāmālākulāṃ nṛpa  HVAppI 
niṣādo baladevāya preṣayitvā mahābalaḥ  HVAppI 
siṃhanādaṃ mahāghoraṃ akarot sa niṣādarāṭ  HVAppI 
sā śaktiḥ sarvakalyāṇī baladevam upāgamat  HVAppI 
utplutya tāṃ mahāghorāṃ balabhadraḥ pratāpavān  HVAppI 
ādāyātha niṣādeśaṃ sarvān vismāpayann iva  HVAppI 
tayaiva taṃ jaghānāśu vakṣodeśe sa mādhavaḥ  HVAppI 
sa tayā tāḍito vīraḥ svaśaktyātha niṣādapaḥ  HVAppI 
vihvalaḥ sarvagātreṣu nipapāta mahītale  HVAppI 
prāṇasaṃśayam āpanno niṣādo rāmatāḍitaḥ  HVAppI 
niṣādās tasya rājendra śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  HVAppI 
aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi niṣādāḥ śastrayodhinaḥ  HVAppI 
gadinaḥ sādinaś caiva maheṣvāsā mahābalāḥ  HVAppI 
śarair anekasāhasraiḥ śaktibhiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ  HVAppI 
gadābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlaiḥ parighaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ  HVAppI 
kuntair atha kuṭhāraiś ca vyadravan rāmam ojasā  HVAppI 
śalabhā iva rājendra dīpyamānaṃ hutāśanam  HVAppI 
te śaraiḥ pātayāṃ cakrū rāmaṃ rāmam ivāparam  HVAppI 
kecit kuṭhārair ājaghnuḥ kecit kuntaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ  HVAppI 
gadābhiḥ kecid āyānti śaktibhiś ca tathāpare  HVAppI 
nijaghnuḥ sahasā rāmaṃ sphurantaṃ pāvakaṃ yathā  HVAppI 
tataḥ kruddho halī sākṣād dhalam udyamya satvaram  HVAppI 
sarvāṃs tān karṣayām āsa musalena vyapothayat  HVAppI 
te hanyamānā rāmeṇa niṣādāḥ parvatāśrayāḥ  HVAppI 
nipetur dharaṇīpṛṣṭhe śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ  HVAppI 
kṣaṇena tān mahārāja hatvā sarvān mahābalān  HVAppI 
siṃhavad vinadaṃs tatra tasthau rāmo mahābalaḥ  HVAppI 
tato rātrau mahāghorāḥ piśācāḥ piśitāśanāḥ  HVAppI 
ākṛṣya māṃsayūthāni bhakṣayantaḥ samāsate  HVAppI 
pibantaḥ śoṇitaṃ koṣṇaṃ saṃkṛṣya ca śavaṃ bahu  HVAppI

vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
kravyādāḥ sarva evāśu bhakṣayantas tadā śavam  HVAppI

devāsurasamaṃ rājann udite bhāskare mahat  HVAppI

tataḥ śaraṃ samādāya vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān  HVAppI 
pauṇḍraṃ jaghāna sahasā niśitena śareṇa ha  HVAppI

āroha garuḍaṃ tūrṇaṃ gacchāmo dvārakāṃ purīm  HVAppI 
yataḥ kṛṣṇas tataḥ sarve gacchanti jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ  HVAppI 
vāhanena mayūreṇa sakhībhiḥ parivāritā  HVAppI 
dvārakābhimukhī soṣā devyā prasthāpitā yayau  HVAppI 
tato balaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahābalaḥ  HVAppI 
ārūḍhavanto garuḍam aniruddhaś ca vīryavān  HVAppI 
prasthitaś ca sa tejasvī garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ varaḥ  HVAppI 
unmūlayaṃs tarugaṇān kampayaṃś cāpi medinīm  HVAppI 
ākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā reṇudhvastam ivāmbaram  HVAppI 
garuḍe saṃprayāte 'bhūn mandaraśmir divākaraḥ  HVAppI

tat phalaṃ labhate nūnaṃ purāṇaśravaṇād dhareḥ  HVAppI 
brahmahā bhrūṇahā goghnaḥ surāpo gurutalpagaḥ  HVAppI 
sakṛt purāṇaśravaṇāt pūto bhavati nānyathā  HVAppI 
idaṃ mayā te parikīrtitaṃ mahac  HVAppI 
chrīkṛṣṇamāhātmyam apāram adbhutam  HVAppI 
śṛṇvan paṭhann āśu samāpnuyāt phalaṃ  HVAppI 
yac cāpi lokeṣu sudurlabhaṃ mahat  HVAppI
